_comment: Custom node type mappings for metadata extraction configuration
_description: Add your custom ComfyUI node class names here to extend metadata extraction support
_usage: Restart ComfyUI after editing this file. Custom classes are merged with built-in defaults.
_sampler_classes_comment: Add custom sampler node class names (lowercase). Examples: customsampler, mysampler, advancedsampler
_checkpoint_loader_classes_comment: Add custom checkpoint loader class names. Examples: CustomCheckpointLoader, MyModelLoader
_unet_loader_classes_comment: Add custom UNET/diffusion model loader class names. Examples: CustomUNETLoader, MyDiffusionLoader
_diffusers_loader_classes_comment: Add custom diffusers loader class names. Examples: CustomDiffusersLoader, MyDiffusersWrapper
_lora_classes_comment: Add custom LoRA loader class names. Examples: CustomLoraLoader, AdvancedLoraLoader
